params.factoryAddress: The address of the IATKTimeBoundAirdropFactory contract.
params.name: The human-readable name for the airdrop.
params.owner: The initial owner of the contract.
params.root: The Merkle root for verifying claims.
params.startTime: The timestamp when claims can begin.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed.

ETHTransfersNotAllowed().notice: Custom error for when direct ETH transfers to the proxy are attempted.

ImplementationNotSetInFactory().notice: Custom error when the factory does not have an implementation address set for the time-bound airdrop.

InitializationWithZeroAddress().notice: Custom error when attempting to initialize the proxy with a zero address for the implementation.

InvalidFactoryAddress().notice: Custom error when the provided factory address is invalid (e.g. zero address or does not support the required interface).

userdoc.notice: This contract is a proxy that delegates calls to an implementation of ATKTimeBoundAirdrop. The implementation address is fetched from a specified ATKTimeBoundAirdropFactory contract.

devdoc.details: This proxy is intended to be deployed by ATKTimeBoundAirdropFactory. It stores the factory address and uses it to determine the logic contract.

params.factoryAddress: The address of the IATKTimeBoundAirdropFactory contract.
params.name: The human-readable name for the airdrop.
params.owner: The initial owner of the contract.
params.root: The Merkle root for verifying claims.
params.startTime: The timestamp when claims can begin.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed.

devdoc.title: Proxy for ATKTimeBoundAirdrop, managed by a factory.
